content.detailedDescription: As i was going down i-5 south bound , i noticed a sorta bright triangle behind  my car as  i was driving. think it was reflecting the lights from the highway and cars. it was dim and  cloudly  that night. but it seem to follow me down i-% for about 5  minutes  or so. airplane maybe but didn't see any postion lights or landing lights. then it just disappeared. just curious to what it was.
content.summary: Triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: I just left my mums house ,was walking down a long road to meet a friend but on the way in the clear blue sky a mysterious abnormal yellow diamond (blurred) was floating across the sky and ever since then my conscious has not been the same and it has expanded very much. i can't honestly remember how i losses the sight but thinking back to the moment i didn't have a phone on me otherwise i'm sure i would have captured a picture. i have seen the exact same sighting on the documentry (alien files unsealed) i am only 18 years of age and i have a son and i am going to make sure he knows the truth as he grows up and to raise awareness to the new generation.
content.summary: Pure blue sky and yellow diamond floating across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was getting off the off ramp at ellsworth and the i-60, noticed that a light reflected off an object with no lights on. i realized the object (silhouette ) was a circular craft like object with hovering in the distance, a light (bright green) then started to spin on the bottom of the craft-like object (like a propulsion type system), the lights were spinning with great speed then it darted off directly east from where i was, so fast it left a green trail, and an aura of green light flashed in the distance, almost like it was leaving the atmosphere.
content.summary: Hovering towards gold canyon, then flew away

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting at a red light on the corner of edge road waiting to turn right onto the a56. my son pointed out an unusual object. i looked out of the window towards manchester city centre. i saw a tube/cigar like object i front of a dark grey cloud. the sky was still light in places. 
the object was moving upwards. it was very bright in colour. i couldn't tell if it was one entire light or lots of small ones. 
once the object got to the top of the cloud it vanished in front of our eyes. i couldn't tell if it went across the cloud on the top or into the cloud.
content.summary: The object was against a dark cloud so easily seen. it slowly climbed up the side of the cloud. once atop of cloud it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: A crowd of people at waldemier park in erie pennsyvaina witnessed a stationary red light in clear sky, that shot off, then came in from oposite direction from over lake erie and became stationary in approximately the same spot. there was no sound that accompanied light. at times was moving very slowly, or was stationary, then would move off at a high rate of speed. lasted for close to half an hour. many people were commenting on light, but no consensus on what it exactly was.
content.summary: Large group of people winessed red noisless light at wlademier park

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were traveling east of soledad cyn rd passing the saugus speedway. at that time we saw a green orb about 65 degreed off the horizon hovering. about 30 seconds later, this green orb made a straight line dash to the se  towards the nike base at a hight rate of speed (faster than a shooting star). this object left a green line behind it, from the place it started from. the orb stopped at the mountain top, about where the nike base is, and was gone. there was no sound whatsoever from the object. it was a clear night, you could see the stars. it was about 85 degrees outside as well.
content.summary: Sighted stationary overhead as green orb. then straight line dash to se faster then shooting star.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was  sitting on my sofa in my living room, waiting for the daily journal.
2. while i was waiting i watched the wether  and i looked at the clouds which changed slowly into an 
    aircraft, very big en with pulsating motors  on each side.
3. i was astonished, wat clouds kan do.
 4. the cloud went slowly bigger until it had the shape of an aircraft. still i thought that it was a cloud
    even when i noticed the motors pulsating. maybe the  wether, i thought. i looked at the cloud for at 
    least 2 minutes, than it changes into all the other clouds.
    but,i was it already  forgotten, when i sat down on my sofa in my living room, waiting for the daily 
    news the following evening, the 13 june at 19.58 pm. there the cloud came back on the same place
    at the same time in the same shape. 
5. i could not believe what i saw en told my husband .He smiled.But i told him, that i would write it 
    down en make a little picture.
    i cannot longer believe, that clouds can do that. so i thought it must be a shadow of al real thing.
    i wrote in my book. my window its 120 x80 and the cloud plane was 40 x 60. 
6. it disappeared  between the other clouds . i watched nearly every other evenings, but nothing 
    happened.
content.summary: Two evenings after another a big cloud changes into an aircraft with pulsing motors and disappeared .Taking the same shape of all the other clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:27 p.M. pt, 3 adults in my family observed a moon-like object 1/10 the size of the full moon (the mostly full moon was also visible when we saw the object). the object was much larger than a planet or star and was easily seen though it was still light out as was the moon. it had dark blue patterns on it similar to the moon's appearance.

relative to the moon, the object was higher than the moon and located further south in the southeast sky. it seemed to change shape a bit as we watched it for about 15 minutes.  we went in the house to eat dinner and i checked a couple times outside and it was still visible.

after we finished dinner at about 9:30 p.M. pt it was dark and the object was no longer visible.

i'm guessing it was a comet or meteor but the fact we perceived it to remain stationary in the sky the entire time we viewed it makes me wonder if that's what it could have been.
content.summary: Moon-like object 1/10 size of full moon. much larger than planet or star.

content.detailedDescription:
Unidentified objects filmed over the urals through the night vision.
during simulation, the sky and the time any satellites at this location was not in accordance with stellarium program.

there were 3 ufos, one flew south, it was the first ufo.

the second object in the sky which flew under the star altair was similar to the brightness of the star and moved to the north.
content.summary: Unidentified objects in earth orbit july 2016

content.detailedDescription: My fiance' took a picture of the last rays of sunlight in a strip of shops just n of the mall. it wasn't until i was looking at the pictures that i noticed a diamond shaped series of lights, 3 white/blue and one at the tip was reddish. it was so far off, we never saw the object, but captured it on film.
content.summary: Discovered in picture taken at dusk of parking lot n of lynnhaven mall

content.detailedDescription: In 1978 i was a student at university of pittsburgh at bradford and was taking a course in backpacking for 2 credits. the instructor was driving us in a station wagon toward allegheny st park and we were about to embark on a 10 mile hike and an overnight camp. i was looking at the sky out the window and noticed what looked like a small military jet flying in what i thought at the time was a northern direction (not at top speed but a few hundred mph) toward the allegheny st park on our right. it left a short vapor trail behind it. what was unusual was that there appeared to be a multiple faceted metallic disk tailing it quite closely, like within 150 feet of it flying at the same speed but not leaving a trail. it seemed to have a polygonal shape with 8 to 10 sharp even length edges. the sun was out and it was mainly a blue sky. it had a shiny metallic surface. that is all the detail i could see. it looked like 3000 to 5000 feet up and it might have been 20 to 40 feet across i am guessing because i am not sure of the altitude. anyway i shouted out "i think i see a ufo" and they all laughed as if i was nuts (a fun group of course) but my roommate who was a smart guy and was a paramedic at age 17, double checked me and immediately corroborated what i saw, "no i think that might be a ufo". suddenly i had cred! the teacher immediately pulled the car over. everyone wanted to see. and we all got out to look at it. it actually stopped and hovered right then almost directly above us (thousands of feet up - about the size of a small aspirin 4 feet away) at that point as the jet continued flying along on its path seemingly oblivious to that there was something right behind it. then after about 15 or 20 seconds, while the jet was still visible, this object slid across the sky within about 1 second (about 5 or 10 degrees) to get right back on the tail of the jet, and continued following the jet once again right on its tail and at the same lower speed of the jet. in the moment it 'slid' across the sky, it left no trail, and it was quick like only 1 second for it to travel the distance the jet had flown in probably 15 to 20 seconds. that might have been faster than or close to the speed of sound but there was no sonic boom. this all happened within about a 2 minute timespan. none of us reported this, but i seem to remember pretty clearly that i found out by either tv or a local newspaper that there were a number of ufo reports or sightings north of there, across the border in ny state on the same day we saw this thing. i don't remember the exact day but i assume it was late in the semester that year because we had to hike neck deep through a stream (so i am saying it was late may). i was only there in bradford 2 years so it was either 1977 or 1978 and i'm thinking it was '78 but i'm not 100% on that.
content.summary: Metallic facted edges disc about 1 mile high following jet flying n to allegeny state park; we pulled over and concurred it was ufo - it hovered above us then slid across sky to continue tailing jet (military jet?)

content.detailedDescription: My cellphone got noised i saw some thing out glowing. i couldnt breath. i couldnt look anywher els. i hear so many voices in my head now. i looked at it about 40mins. it didnt move then it disapeard.
content.summary: Triangel unknown matetial 3 light on 3angels didnt move for 40mins and diapeard

content.detailedDescription: While waiting for a firework show to start, i observed what i thought to be a helicopter close to where the fireworks would go off. wondering why it would be so close to that location, i realized that it wasn't a helicopter. at first, the external lights blinked only green, eventually it would blink green and red. shortly before the show would start it disappeared and two smaller craft appeared. one was a solid green, the other a solid red. i tried to film these craft but the were to small for my camara to film. these craft moved and incredible speed and then slow down. the altitude these craft were at exceed and drone that you could purchase for private use. eventually i lost site of the solid green object and was able to observe the solid red object from time to time. the larger craft reappeared right before the firework show and moved all around the area. these objects made no sound. at times, it appeared to be right next to the fireworks and eventually moved west towards the ocean which was close to the end of the show. at this time, you can see the object move behind trees and shrubs due to its distance and altitude. i spent a number of years in the military and am knowledgeable in our nations aircraft. it is my opinion that this was not a military aircraft. the number of people enjoying the firework show ranged within the hundreds and is unclear if anyone else whittnessed these objects.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo's observed near firework show in chula vista ca

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was outside my front door to my apartment on the porch area looking up at the sky as i do often to watch the skies for unknown objects and to see if there are any chemtrails or strange cloud formations and this object caught my eye, so i observed it as it traveled across the sky. at first i thought it was contrails but it was going to fast. as it got closer and above my head i noticed it was brighter than the sun and it had no wings and no sound. after about 3 min as it got over my head to nw behind me it just disappeared without a trace. i'm sorry i didn't think to bring out something to record it but i will from now on keep my ipod nano or cellphone at the ready.
content.summary: Unknown object caught my eye.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming out of my cousins car and noticed a flashing orange saucer.It was a bright orange.A rocket.The object was a saucer and it had orange light around it then it went up and split then they disappeared.I was shocked that i saw that.It disappeared.All 5 of us tried to record it but it would not show up
content.summary: I was coming out of my cousins car and saw the ufo flask its light and split

content.detailedDescription: As reported to asd by phone today:"my wife and i and our neighbors have been observing multiple unidentified objects in the skies for the past six weeks. the first object was in the trees then it moved towards me and stopped just 20' from me, it was a white ball of light or orb. i didn't know what it was and took a picture with my cell phone, but when the flash went off, the object shot straight up in the air and stopped, then it started flashing blue and red, then it moved quickly further away, then stopped, seeming to be watching me. my wife and i have been watching the skies ever since this incident and along with the neighbors, have seen many different types and shapes of objects in the skies. most are a dark grey color, some are white, and others are a round disk shape with square block shapes on the bottom. some have a jet like sound, others produce no sound at all and seem to have no propulsion system. i called whiteman air force base to report this because it seemed that the objects were starting to get hostile. one chased me down the road and i became very afraid that something would happen. whiteman told me to call missouri mufon and report this. on saturday night, july 16, things culminated when we saw many objects, and while i was taking photos of them and the lightning (with no thunder) from my front yard, a police officer saw me and asked what i was doing. i told him what i was doing and he called more police in, they thought i was crazy and arrested me and my wife, and called family services to take my 13-year old daughter to my mother and she is still there. they came in and took my computer, laptop, camera, and all of my weapons in the house. i really think someone needs to come check this out as something is going on and the police don't seem to care. i don't know if it is our military or something else but it is a serious situation that needs to be investigated."
content.summary: Observed at least 50 ufos and orbs close and far away all over the skies, one chased me

content.detailedDescription: My sister was out on the east 2nd story patio and saw a disc shaped cloud hovering over a vacant field across the street at approximately 12:30 pm. she had me come and look at it and i took photos and a video. the cloud held the oval shape for over a half hour. it was the only cloud in the blue desert sky. the edges of the cloud object appeared to be circulating. the cloud then disentigrated after a half hour. later that evening my sister received a news prompt on her telephone about ufo clouds that are appearing all over. we thought this was very coincidental since we just witnessed one.
content.summary: Ufo appeared as a cloud in the blue sky

content.detailedDescription: I noticed while throwing a football with a friend in the middle of the street that the full moon had a weird bite taken out of it, like a cookie.  assembled my friends family to take a look and agreed that was very strange.  at this point i raced home to grab my father's telescope for a better look.  drove out to an overpass right over i-70 and set up the telescope.  my friend, his brother and myself took turns looking at this object that had by now traveled to the middle of the moon giving it the appearance of a donut.  again it was my turn to take another look and right before my eyes the orb broke into several pieces, 6 to 10.  they then traveled outwards from the center and within about 20 seconds the moon was full with nothing obstructing it.  at this point we all thought that was it.  the moon was setting in the northeast and maybe just about 10 degrees off the horizon.  i took a final look through the scope and all the orbs started to reappear again traveling from the outside to the center of the moon.  after they again formed a singular structure again the main orb slowly drifted at about an 11 o' clock angle and vanished.  baffles me to this day.
content.summary: Dark orb in front of moon, split into multiple orbs, then reassembled over about 30 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were getting on the highway and we both looked at the moon. (it was still light out in north dakota) i saw these two lines on the moon, at that first split second i thought it looked like a very gigantic satellite. my friend said, "megan, do you see this?" i couldn't even speak. i just stared at it. i wanted to pick up the phone to call my husband who was driving in front of us but i didn't have time. i only blinked once because it was moving. i watched it move across the moon in about 3 seconds. it was longer than the moon. it looked like a ladder with one step. my friend saw it after it passed by the moon, she said it looked like a ladder and watched it go below. then it was gone. i felt sick because i knew that it was something out of this world. there is nothing that big here on earth. i mean it was huge! i felt like it was mirrored because it blended in with the sky. i lost it after it passed by the moon only because it looked like the sky. i could not see the surface but as it passed by the moon it looked like black lines. then it was blending in with the clouds so my only guess would be that it had to be mirrored in order to look invisible. after this happened we were trying to understand what it could be. there is nothing that big. it was so far away. it looked like someone painted the moon. i want to know what this was! i feel like there is so much i don't know now. so much out  there could be but we only see what we see. that 3 seconds was a glimpse of what is possible. without a doubt i know what i saw and what i saw was not of this world.
content.summary: Looked like a ladder with one step as big as the moon passed by moon then blended in with the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was going thru deleting a bunch of videos that my daughter recordes wondrouslywhen i came across this interesting video enjoy
content.summary: Daughter accidentaly records spacecraft

content.detailedDescription:
9:12pm to 9:22pm looking due west, a blinking green light, then solid red, then blinking red, hovering then flying then hovering. no noise and covered about 6-8 miles of sky.

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? 
outside front yard beginning a 8:45pm looking s, sw, w, nw, n. like a human radar dish, constantly sweeping my head back and forth.

2. what made you first notice the object? 
it was sequentially blinking a pale green light but no other lights at all. i did not see where it originated from. it was in level flight when i first saw it.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
i thought it was a drone until the blinking green light went to solid red then blinking red. no noise whatsoever and its speed was too fast. 

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
object would fly a few miles then come to a dead hover then fly a few more miles and come to dead hover about 2,000-4,000 ft. altitude. it looked like it was doing an aerial survey. it was completely silent and covered as much as 8 miles of sky.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
no emotions really to speak of because i've seen it before on 2 or 3 other occasions within a 30 minute time window for all the sightings, from my exact same viewing location and its roughly same location relative to my viewing point and the exact same weather and visibility conditions. unlimited visibility and winds were calm.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
it descended and i lost sight of it to my nw because of an apartment building in my line of sight. as i normally do for this particular object.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 9:12pm looking due west, a blinking green light, then solid red, then blinking red, hovering then flying then hovering. no noise and covered about 6-8 miles of sky.

content.detailedDescription: Estana jugando en el patio de mi casa, estaba un primo menor que yo y otro niño que no recierdo quien era,de repente a la altuta de las hojas de de platanos veo un objeto de color aluminio, pero con aspecto desgastado en forma de cigarro y sin ruido, y muy lentamente cruzó la carretera a otra finca y no lo vi más,  muchos años despues, volví a ver algo extraño,  pero ya en la noche tarde, luego contare esta experiencia.
content.summary: Ufo desperto en mi el deceo de contar mi avistamiento

content.detailedDescription: I was on my boat in on lake champlain floating in the middle of shelburne bay. i looked up and saw the unknown object slowly flying across the sky. i called the attention of my sister and father who joined me in observing the object. i observed it drop about 3 or 4 unknown orbs which fell to the ground out of sight from where we were. the object then hovered in the same spot for about 20 minutes before it disappeared. i recall the object being white and the orbs it dropped also being white. however my sister recalls the object and the orbs being black. my father thought it was a blimp and was quick to brush off the thought of a ufo. we saw the unknown craft again hovering over a spot closer to us when we traveled north into burlington bay. the craft quickly vanished again after that.
content.summary: White/black cigar shaped. dropped off three unknown objects.

content.detailedDescription: Around 10 p.M. myself and a friend were walking through my neighborhood playing a cell phone game. when the game froze i stopped and looked up at the sky which was clear and star filled in the area that i was looking. i noticed what i thought at first was a plane/light moving at high speed at a significant altitude. the light was heading in a roughly northerly direction but seemed to be ascending. i had the impression that the object was a significant distance away, possibly miles, due the smallness of the light from my point of view. because of this i was surprised to see how much distance it was covering relative to the short time that i witnessed the object, about 15 seconds. there is, admittedly, a lot of air traffic in the area where i witnessed this object. due to the regular air traffic i am well accustomed to how fast a plane travels and appears at all manner of distances and lighting conditions. compared to all other aircraft that i see in the area be they near, far, fast, slow, hovering(like a helicopter or chinese lantern) this object appeared far faster and higher in altitude than most or all. furthermore, i have witnessed many aircraft landing at the airport near me and so have witnessed many aircraft with their headlights/forward landing lights on as well as noticed all aircraft with green and red directional indicator lights engaged. the object that i witnessed had no directional lighting that i could see but instead was simply appeared as a constant white light. furthermore about half way through the sighting the object flashed a bright white light briefly. it then appeared to increase speed and altitude and disappeared/dimmed/possibly exited the atmosphere. i mention the forward landing lights on planes earlier because this object was at all times heading north away from my position during this sighting including when the flash occurred. i do not believe i could have been seeing a forward running light of a plane.
content.summary: Light appeared to travel ascend towards the north. flashed briefly and continued at high speed possibly out of atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I was standing at my back door smoking when i saw it coming towards me and it turned right in an eastwards direction, i think this may be the same one coming back again, i also had a possible sighting of it on the 2nd july, 2016 at about 12,20am, this is now the 5th time i have seen this, it is a white ball shape object as i have seen it from the front and side and rear, it is about 20 foot in diameter and this is what most other people are seeing from a distance only the first time i saw it, it was very close to my house and flying low about the speed of a single engine 2 seat plane and it just flew off eastwards until out of sight.
content.summary: Bright white light ball uk

content.detailedDescription: took dogs outside to go to bath room. i was looking at cloudy  sky  thinking its going to rain. bewteen clouds passing by i saw a bright maybe 2 showing its self then like it was ducking in  and out of  clouds. thinking it was only maybe 400 ft or less. i watched it for maybe 5 to 10 minutes as it passed from west to the east then disappers into the clouds. i think it may have been 2 lights i was seeing because they were at different positions i think.
content.summary: Looked  like a large moving bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
On sept. 22 2015 around 9pm, my fiance woke me up to say she saw weird lights outside. so i went outside on my apartment balcony to look, and sure enough i did not and still am not sure what i saw. there were about 3 objects going by every 5 mins for a total of about a half hour. i took a video on my iphone and my fiance took a video on her ipad. after that i pretty much brushed it off...Until april. i was watching ufo youtube videos and it reminded of my videos. so i decided to do a frequent snapshot between both videos. after that i did zoom ins and contrast and lighting edits, and could not believe what i think i captured. one"vehicle" had 2 beings sitting inside of an acorn shaped object that was so small it resembled two people sitting in a bumper car behind each other. the one in the front, you can see his eyes and the top of his head. the one in the rear, you can see his whole face. the other object was even weirder. is was significantly bigger and seemed transparent in the snapshot. you could see one being sitting in the center in some sort of chair on a "laptop". you can also see computer screens mounted on the wall and floor. a door can also be seen. listen, i don't know if this is some elaborate prank or what. i only know what i saw. pictures and videos will be in attachments. it would be very nice if i can find somebody more experience in this field to help me out with this. my mind is completely blown from this. 

ps. i have alot more photos. will send everything upon response.
content.summary: Seemed to be transparent small drone vehicles. about 3 flew by every five minutes for a half an hour

content.detailedDescription:
Golden balloon like object observed in bright sky with long appendage hanging from its bottom.
object was first stationary and then floated slowly away.
photos have to be enlarged to see the object clearly.
content.summary: This may not have been a ufo but a rsearch balloon but it had an unusual form for a balloon

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were recording odd skywriting while my car was serviced at tires plus.  we were on the sidewalk on the west side of state road 7 just south of the intersection at sw 18th street (marina blvd) looking to the east.  while recording, an object flew threw the sky infront of where i was recording from the south to north.  i could not make out what it was until i checked the still shots of the video.  it was the fastest moving thing i have ever seen.  see attached video approx 5-6 sec in..It zips by in a fraction of a second.  i also attached a screen shot of it.  it appears to by a dark colored craft with some sort or energy below it, and what could be a cockpit type hatch on the top.  it made no noise whatsoever.
content.summary: Dark craft flew across sky incredibly fast from south to north

content.detailedDescription: It was around 0300 and i was taking a break from netflix, i stepped out in my backyard to get some fresh air. the skis were clear and as i got outside i looked up and noticed a bright round object at 90* up traveling from west to east i figured this could be the iss. i have seen the iss fly over many times and this object looked very familiar. after it faded into the eastern sky i was looking back up in the sky at around 80 degrees when i saw a white-silver mushroom cloud open up and an white fireball object materialize from it and heading south. the mushroom cloud than seem to fade away quickly. the fireball was a steady white color. after 3-4 seconds it dissappeared while heading in the south direction. there was no trail or noise coming from this object. there were no airplanes or aircraft flying in the area either. i am retired navy and have never observed anything like the 2nd object in my life.
content.summary: White silver mushroom cloud appearing and a white round fireball coming out of it than cloud disappearing with object heading south 2-3 sec than disappearing.
